title: Which is better for music production, the i3 7350k or the i5 7600k? Although the i3 7350k has faster single core speed, I need an overview of both. - Quora

response.answer_text: Disclaimer: Short answer because i’m on mobile Both are good options but you should get the i5–7600k because you need the extra cores, get atleast 16GB of speedy, speedy ram. Pedro de Castro is a Sound engineer, music producer and PC builder £

The i5-7600k has a higher CPU Mark from Passmark’s performance benchmarking, which covers a variety of mathematical, compression, GUI, DirectX, OpenCL, read/write, and RAM tests. i5-7600k: 9267 Passmark CPU Mark i3–7350k: 6883 Passmark CPU Mark List of Benchmarked CPUs
